mapper.sql: dist_id, dist_name, dist_code, dist_category, dist_address, dist_parent_id, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, usable, remarks
mapper.select:
select
from sys_district where dist_id = #{distId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and usable = 1
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_district
dist_id,
dist_name,
dist_code,
dist_category,
dist_address,
dist_parent_id,
create_time,
create_by,
update_time,
update_by,
usable,
remarks,
#{distId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{distName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{distCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{distCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{distAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{distParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{usable,jdbcType=BIT},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sys_district
dist_name = #{distName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dist_code = #{distCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dist_category = #{distCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dist_address = #{distAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dist_parent_id = #{distParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usable = #{usable,jdbcType=BIT},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dist_id = #{distId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_district set dist_name = #{distName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dist_code = #{distCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dist_category = #{distCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dist_address = #{distAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dist_parent_id = #{distParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usable = #{usable,jdbcType=BIT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dist_id = #{distId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select COUNT(1) from sys_district where dist_name = #{distName}
select COUNT(1) from sys_district where dist_name = #{distName} and usable = 1
select COUNT(1) from sys_district where dist_name = #{distName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dist_id != #{distId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and usable = 1

select
from sys_district where dist_parent_id = #{distId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and usable = 1

SELECT s1.dist_id, s1.dist_name, s1.dist_code, s1.dist_category, sd.dict_key AS dist_category_name, s1.dist_address, s1.dist_parent_id, s2.dist_name AS dist_parent_name, s1.create_time, s1.create_by, s1.update_time, s1.update_by, s1.usable, s1.remarks FROM sys_district s1 LEFT JOIN sys_district s2 ON s1.dist_parent_id = s2.dist_id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd on s1.dist_category = sd.dict_value and sd.dict_category = 'dist_type' and sd.usable = 1 WHERE s1.usable = 1 ORDER BY s1.dist_id
mapper.sql: SELECT dict_value FROM sys_dictionary WHERE dict_category = 'dist_type' AND dict_key = #{distCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update sys_district set dist_name = #{distName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dist_code = #{distCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dist_category = #{distCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dist_address = #{distAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dist_parent_id = #{distParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dist_id = #{distId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT s1.dist_id, s1.dist_name, s1.dist_code, s1.dist_category, sd.dict_key AS dist_category_name, s1.dist_address, s1.dist_parent_id, s2.dist_name AS dist_parent_name, s1.create_time, s1.create_by, s1.update_time, s1.update_by, s1.usable, s1.remarks FROM sys_district s1 LEFT JOIN sys_district s2 ON s1.dist_parent_id = s2.dist_id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary sd on s1.dist_category = sd.dict_value and sd.dict_category = 'dist_type' and sd.usable = 1 WHERE s1.usable = 1
AND s1.dist_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{distName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND s1.dist_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{distCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
ORDER BY s1.dist_id
